ygData.subject: Re: Solusek
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I took my rogue to visit the gnome city to see things for myself... Its actually a rather large city in there, well populated with gnome miners,
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I took my rogue to visit the gnome city to see things for myself...
Its actually a rather large city in there, well populated with gnome
miners, curators, and loads of clockworks... Unfortunately, there was only
one named gnome that I saw there, he was the one selling the bag of
tinkerers, broken frost modules, small power modules, etc...

I could get no response from my hails... I asked about fishing poles,
journals, Gimblestan, the works... nada.

I also got lost and died there... fully decked out in my gear.

I went back to retrieve my corpse (which all i had was the loc of) and died
again.

I then went back again and AMAZINGLY both my corpses were sitting at the
entrance... Praise Brell Serelis! I thought I had lost my stuff... I
shuddered at the thought of losing my bloodclaw stiletto, shaped oaken
recurve bow, grotesque mask, and golden black pearl necklace. I just love
bugs (makes up for all the bugs that got me killed).


At 03:00 AM 09/10/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Eron Linver <aeron@...>
>
>You only need a group of 2 really. One is a bit crazy. You just stay at the
>zone and pull things there and fight. It is best to fight down in the
>room near
>the sol b zone. It is nicely spaced out and it is safe to zone into sol b.
>Atleast for a short while. Have a tank with you, and a healer is always nice.
>With those 3 in a party you should be fine, but even a full party is cool
>there. you can pull MoBs according to your party. You get plenty of FS as
>loot, and good exp.
